content: introducing the woolly plains socks a simple yet versatile design inspired by the vast serene landscapes of regional australia these socks capture the essence of the australian plains offering a cozy comfortable knit that s perfect for everyday wear whether you re a beginner looking for a straightforward project or an experienced knitter seeking a relaxing knit the woolly plains socks are a perfect choice with their clean lines and timeless appeal these socks will become a staple in your handmade wardrobe slip into the warmth and simplicity of the woolly plains socks and bring a touch of australian tranquility to your knitting **sizes** * 1 2 3 * 20-22 cm 22-25 cm 25-28 cm / 8-9 9-10 10-11 **designers note ** these socks are based on foot circumference not shoe size knit the length of the foot as long as required **materials** * fingering weight/ 4 ply 100 g/ 3 52 oz 400 m/437 yds 75% wool/25% nylon or any yarn that will match gauge * 2 5mm/us 1 - 80cm/ 32 circular needles or any preferred method for knitting socks in the round please note these instructions are only for magic loop method * stitch markers 4 * bor marker * tapestry needle **gauge** after blocking in st st 34 sts & 48 row = 4′′ / 10 cm
